meta.desc: Disable Night Light for 10 seconds. This short interruption allows you to scan a colour code (e.g. Crontosign) from your screen.
meta.desc_long: Disable Night Light for 10 seconds. This short interruption allows you to scan a colour code (e.g. Crontosign) from your screen.
